item.description:
Just you're average crazy halloween party - costumes optional but tremendously encouraged !!!
I've been a DJ for 18 years and have been told that I am very good at choosing the right music for the crowd. I have an excellent sound system and over 125,000 songs to choose from - and adding to the list all the time.

Salerno's is a beautiful, quaint and intimate setting that is great for parties like this. Classy and trendy - and the food, staff and drinks are always the best. I hope to see you there. It promises to be a fun time.

- R

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Halloween Party
